newFeatures.name: Verbesserungen beim Umschalten von Kommentaren für CSS/HTML
newFeatures.description: Verschiedene Fehler beim Verarbeiten vom Umschalten bei Zeilen- und Block-Kommentaren in CSS- und HTML-Dateien.

newFeatures.name: Filterung von HTML-Attributen in Code-Vorschlägen
newFeatures.description: Beim Anzeigen von Code-Vorschlägen für Attribute werden die bestehenden Attribute des Tags nicht erneut vorgeschlagen.

newFeatures.name: Datei im Arbeitsbereich umbenennen
newFeatures.description: Klicken auf die aktive Datei im Arbeitsbereich bewirkt ein Umbenennen der Datei.

newFeatures.name: Neue/Aktualisierte Übersetzungen
newFeatures.description: In diesem Sprint wurde eine neue russische Übersetzung beigesteuert. Auch die deutschen und spanischen Übersetzungen wurden aktualisiert.

newFeatures.name: Inline Color Picker
newFeatures.description: When the cursor is on a hex, rgb() or hsl() color, you can use Ctrl-E or ⌘E to edit the color inline.

newFeatures.name: CSS Highlighting in Live Preview
newFeatures.description: While Live Preview is active, putting the cursor in a rule in a CSS file highlights items affected by that rule in the browser.

newFeatures.name: Block Comment/Uncomment
newFeatures.description: Use Ctrl-Shift-/ or ⌘⇧/ to toggle block comments around the current selection.

newFeatures.name: Find in File or Folder
newFeatures.description: You can now search the contents of a specific file or folder by choosing "Find in…" from the context menu in the file tree.

newFeatures.name: New/Updated Translations
newFeatures.description: A new Turkish translation for Brackets was added and the Japanese, German, Spanish, French and Italian translations were updated, all by community members.

newFeatures.name: URL Mapping for Live Preview
newFeatures.description: You can now use Live Preview with server-based content by specifying a base URL in Project Settings.

newFeatures.name: Extensions Stored Outside of the Application Folder
newFeatures.description: Extensions are now stored per user. Windows: C:\Users\<user>\AppData\Roaming\Brackets\extensions. Mac: /Users/<user>/Library/Application Support/Brackets/extensions.

newFeatures.name: Working Set Sorting and Reordering
newFeatures.description: Sort by name, type or time added by choosing an option from the context menu. Also, the working set may be reordered using drag and drop.

newFeatures.name: New/Updated Translations
newFeatures.description: A new Japanese translation for Brackets was added and the German translation has been updated (both are community contributed).

newFeatures.name: Improved Quick Open
newFeatures.description: Quick Open now searches on the whole path (not just filename), and accepts CamelCase abbreviations and other non-contiguous matches.

newFeatures.name: Status Bar
newFeatures.description: Displays cursor info, file size, file type, JSLint notification, indentation preferences and busy spinner.

newFeatures.name: Indentation Preferences
newFeatures.description: Toggle between indentation via tabs or spaces and set the indentations size from the status bar.

newFeatures.name: Auto Reload in Live Preview
newFeatures.description: Reloads the browser when saving non-CSS files.

newFeatures.name: Resizable Bottom Panels
newFeatures.description: Search Results and JSLint panels can now resize vertically.

newFeatures.name: Incremental Find
newFeatures.description: Highlights the first matching result when typing in the Find dialog.

newFeatures.name: Delete Line
newFeatures.description: Ctrl+Shift+D or ⌘⇧D to delete the current line or lines if there is a selection.

newFeatures.name: Code Hints for Relative URLs
newFeatures.description: href and src attributes show relative paths for files on disk.

newFeatures.name: New Folder
newFeatures.description: Create a new folder using the File > New Folder menu item or when right clicking in the project tree.

newFeatures.name: Rename Files and Folders
newFeatures.description: Right click on a file or folder in the project tree and choose Rename.

newFeatures.name: Show in File Tree
newFeatures.description: Navigate > Show in File Tree menu item will highlight the current file.

newFeatures.name: New Translations
newFeatures.description: Italian and Brazilian Portuguese community contributed translations.

newFeatures.name: New Editor Font: Source Code Pro
newFeatures.description: Brackets now uses a new, open-source monospace font called Source Code Pro.

newFeatures.name: Help Menu
newFeatures.description: Moved Debug menu items "Show Extensions Folder" and "Check for Updates" to a new Help menu.

newFeatures.name: Improved Development Workflow
newFeatures.description: See the brackets-shell README.

newFeatures.name: Finished French Localization
newFeatures.description: Both the application and installers are now localized in French.

newFeatures.name: Version Info
newFeatures.description: Version info can be accessed via the Help > About menu.
